content: I did't see a FHIR Shorthand stream here, but I wrote a quick syntax highlighting package for Vim -- https://github.com/Vermonster/vim-fsh

Hi @Brian Kaney -- that's awesome! We've been tracking FHIR Shorthand discussions over here:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179280-fhir.2Finfrastructure-wg/topic/FHIR.20Shorthand

That said, it probably is about time we create a separate stream for it. I'll talk to @Mark Kramer about that.
